author: markt
msg: Removal of a socket from the poller needs to happen on the poller thread as removal, like addition, is not thread safe.
Removal of a socket from the poller needs to remove the socket from the addListif it is present otherwise the closed socket could end up in the poller.

author: rmannibucau
msg: TOMEE-1051 using a filter for arquillian to avoid issues when mapping an app filter to /*
